A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was made for the hard core fans.  Gritty\, sometimes funny with suspense and action.  Deeper dive into characters.  But the most astonishing thing I walked away with was\, that while this was movie #2 in what  typically is a 3 movie segment\, this movie left you in no doubt that they would not be able to wrap up everything in one more movie release.  I'm thinking it may be a never ending story now.
